channel.title: CVE Feed for Anchore Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-1766|2024-08-03T00:16:59.940Z -- anchore%20inc. -- anchore%20enterprise
item.description: Anchore Enterprise anchorectl version 0.1.4 improperly stored credentials when generating a Software Bill of Materials. anchorectl will add the credentials used to access Anchore Enterprise API in the Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) generated by anchorectl. Users of anchorectl version 0.1.4 should upgrade to anchorectl version 0.1.5 to resolve this issue.
